title: Staying Positive as Expectant Parents
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley, Suzanne Gosselin
itunes:summary:
Sadly, many expectant moms and dads are deflated by others' negative comments about child-rearing. John and Danny encourage expectant parents and discuss why children are a blessing.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Suzanne Gosselin's book "Expectant Parents" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-14?refcd=1043705

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/staying-positive-as-expectant-parents/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
